synopsis.text: Koyuki is the only one who believes in Toramizu Ginta's dreams of a magical world, while others dismiss them as mere fantasy. But when a mysterious door appears, Ginta is transported to the enchanting realm of MAR Heaven, where magic and weapons known as Ã„RMS exist. Initially thrilled by the discovery, Ginta soon realizes that this world is not as joyful as he had imagined. With wars looming and a wicked queen threatening the land, Ginta must join forces with newfound friends Babbo, Jack, Alan, and Snow to save MAR Heaven from the clutches of evil. As he embarks on this perilous journey, Ginta's life is forever changed as he gains fighting abilities and discovers the harsh realities of the world he has always dreamed of.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
